content.question: If Nation X produces coffee at a higher opportunity cost than Nation Y, which of the following is true?

choices.label: Nation X must have an absolute advantage in producing coffee.
Nation X must have a comparative advantage in producing coffee.
Nation Y must have an absolute advantage in producing coffee.
Nation Y must have a comparative advantage in producing coffee.
There is insufficient information to determine both absolute and comparative advantage.

content.answer: Nation Y must have a comparative advantage in producing coffee.
